trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKZF007_04262_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The young Arkasodara is staring off into the jungle with worry in his eyes.
TEXT_AKTKZF007_04262_TODO_00<tab>With the chat mode in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Say<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, enter any phrase containing “Sushena” to call out for him.
TEXT_AKTKZF007_04262_TODO_01<tab>Investigate the sounds.
TEXT_AKTKZF007_04262_TODO_02<tab>Use the healing salve on Sushena.
TEXT_AKTKZF007_04262_TODO_03<tab>Report to the Arkasodara youth.

TEXT_AKTKZF007_04262_YOUTH04262_000_000<tab>Ah, excuse me, but you're a traveler, yes? Would you be willing to take on a personal request? I'm worried for the safety of a friend of mine, and would ask you to check on them.

TEXT_AKTKZF007_04262_YOUTH04262_000_001<tab>Thank you. I know you have no shortage of demands on your time. My friend, you see, he's a bit of a private person, and I only wish to know how he is faring after the recent troubles.

TEXT_AKTKZF007_04262_YOUTH04262_000_002<tab>However, the journey to his abode is much too dangerous for me to attempt alone, and I wouldn't dare ask another villager to go in my stead. A traveler with a sharp blade, however, could surely get the task done with little effort.

TEXT_AKTKZF007_04262_YOUTH04262_000_003<tab>He resides in the jungle to the northwest, or at least, he used to. I'll mark the location on your map─his name is Sushena, and if you <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>say<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> his name, he <var 1A 02 /var>should<var 1A 01 /var> respond.

TEXT_AKTKZF007_04262_YOUTH04262_000_004<tab>If my worst fears have come to pass and he is wounded, please use this medicine to treat his wounds. You will be rewarded for your efforts, but I suspect you would have helped me even if I had nothing to give in return.

TEXT_AKTKZF007_04262_YOUTH04262_000_005<tab>I've marked the location that Sushena dwells on your map. <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Say<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> his name, and hopefully he will respond in turn.
TEXT_AKTKZF007_04262_SYSTEM_000_010<tab>Sushena

TEXT_AKTKZF007_04262_SYSTEM_000_011<tab>With the chat mode in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Say<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, use your keyboard or the software keyboard to enter any phrase containing the word “Sushena” near the area marked on your map.
TEXT_AKTKZF007_04262_SYSTEM_000_012<tab>You hear faint sounds of an animal in pain emanating from the direction of the bluffs. Investigate its source.
TEXT_AKTKZF007_04262_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>The yeti appears to be wounded. Perhaps the medicine provided to you will alleviate its suffering.
TEXT_AKTKZF007_04262_FRIEND04262_000_030<tab><huff> <pant>...Ugwah...<pant>...Ungeh...

TEXT_AKTKZF007_04262_SYSTEM_000_031<tab>Although you cannot understand the yeti's words, you can sense the gratitude behind them. Return to the young Arkasodara and inform him that his friend is well.
TEXT_AKTKZF007_04262_YOUTH04262_000_040<tab>Welcome back, traveler! So, how was he?

TEXT_AKTKZF007_04262_YOUTH04262_000_041<tab>Oh, that's horrible! Still, I suppose I can be grateful that you could treat his wounds. I owe Sushena my life─when I was attacked by one of those terrible pisaca, Sushena's roar drove the monster off.

TEXT_AKTKZF007_04262_YOUTH04262_100_041<tab>That was the start of our friendship─one I've treasured ever since. But my family has forbidden me from venturing into the woods, so I haven't been able to check up on him. I know they're only worried for my safety, but still...
TEXT_AKTKZF007_04262_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_AKTKZF007_04262_A1_000_001<tab>You should explain everything to them.
TEXT_AKTKZF007_04262_A1_000_002<tab>You shouldn't abandon your friend!
TEXT_AKTKZF007_04262_YOUTH04262_000_042<tab>You're right, of course. Surely if I explain Sushena's bravery and selflessness, they'd understand. I've nothing to lose by trying, anyways!
TEXT_AKTKZF007_04262_YOUTH04262_000_043<tab>Thank you. Not only did you save Sushena, but you've reminded me what true friendship is worth. It's not much, but please, take this!
